snippet.title: The Demon's Forge [PC DOS] longplay (complete)
snippet.description:
Very old adventure game who came out in 1981 for Apple II and in 1987 for PC DOS. Played the later on DOSBox in Tandy/PCJr mode (best config).

The game has no sound at all, so i added some ambience sound, 'dark backgrounds' from http://www.purple-planet.com. All credits for them. Enjoy!

The Demon's Forge pc game is a property of Mastertronic, Inc. I do not own any of the rights to this game, nor any of the material within this video.
